analysis.key_quote: Abandoning the system that has produced such value in favor of further politicizing federal granting agencies would be a colossal mistake that would do irreparable damage to America's research enterprise and impede the discovery of the next generation of technologies and medical advances.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization in the selection of program officers, emphasizing the importance of maintaining a merit-based system in scientific funding.
